modName: Better Fire and Frost Breath Shouts
summary: Doubles the damage and reduces the cooldown on Fire and Frost Breath Shouts.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/V0ICmGW.png[/img]

This mod simply doubles the damage of Fire and Frost breath shouts and cuts their cooldowns to 10/20/30 to make them viable on higher levels. 90 damage on a 2-minute cooldown felt a little useless and other shouts were more useful so I just made this. If it feels too overpowered, you can just uninstall it and be on your way :)

Damages now:

Fire Breath: 100/140/180

Frost Breath: 20/28/36 per second for 5 seconds, also slows target as usual


Took 2 minutes to create, do whatever you want with it, [b]AS LONG AS YOU DON'T SELL OR MAKE PROFIT OF IT[/b]!

Workshop:

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=248689438]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=248689438[/url]
author: Killeri404
